name: initial_members
text: The game starts with five randomly selected Styles out of a specific group of Styles.

name: scenario_choice
text: On event tiles, conditions on the map may change based on your choices.

name: member_choice
text: On Style tiles, you can swap Styles. However, you cannot have duplicate characters.

name: party_ability_choice
text: On party ability tiles, you can gain party abilities. The effects apply to the entire party.

name: battle
text: Party attributes will increase and you will get rewards upon winning a battle.

name: battle
text: Also, you can choose party enhancement and rewards. HP/LP will be carried over.

name: middle_boss
text: On mighty foe tiles, powerful enemies awaits. The rewards will be better there.

name: middle_boss
text: Consume items in battles to help the party pre-action.

name: middle_boss
text: Use items with the Item button.

name: chart_hp_recovery
text: Styles with 2 LP or more can use 1 LP to fully restore HP.

name: trap_treasure_box
text: You will be rewarded at the rate indicated when you try to open the treasure chest.

name: trap_treasure_box
text: However, there will be a penalty if you failed to open the chest.

name: final_result
text: You can check your adventure log on the results screen. The tutorial ends here!

name: initial_members
text: The following cannot be used outside of Battle Historia:

name: initial_members
text: Styles/Skills/Spells/Items/Formations/Party Abilities and others gained in this mode.

name: initial_members
text: Only Historia Points gained at the end of Steps can be used outside of Battle Historia.

name: initial_members
text: *Historia Points will not be granted in Tutorial.
